body:
Comment 11: 
gc does not report a compile-time error when slicing a constant string with constant
out-of-range indices:

http://play.golang.org/p/5aD_2qdKi7

Per https://golang.org/cl/72160044 this is now an error.
_Labels changed: added **release-go1.4**, removed **release-go1.3**, **documentation**._ _Owner changed to **---**._
